short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A handy calculator for percentage-related queries

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Percentage Hero is a powerful and user-friendly Chrome extension designed to make percentage calculations a breeze. With its sleek, modern design and intuitive interface, this extension is perfect for anyone who needs to perform percentage calculations on a regular basis, whether for work, school, or personal use.

Key Features:

Three-in-One Calculator: Percentage Hero offers three different calculators in one extension, allowing users to easily switch between the following calculations: What is x% of y? x is what percentage of y? What is the percentage increase/decrease from x to y?

Easy-to-Use Interface: The clean and organized layout makes it simple for users to input values, perform calculations, and view results. Each calculator features a dedicated "Calculate" button, ensuring a seamless and efficient user experience.

Convenient Results History: Percentage Hero stores a history of your previous calculations, allowing you to review past results even after closing the extension. The history is conveniently accessible via an accordion-style menu, so you can quickly refer back to past calculations when needed.

Elegant Design: The visually appealing design not only looks great but also enhances the overall user experience.

Install Percentage Hero today and take the hassle out of percentage calculations. Whether you're a student, a professional, or just someone who needs to crunch numbers regularly, Percentage Hero is the perfect tool to simplify and streamline your calculations, making you more efficient and accurate in your everyday tasks.
